Question
========

When multiple regression compares the complete model with a reduced model, the number of degrees of freedom for the numerator of the F Ratio is equal to: 
Answerlist
----------
* N -1.
* K.
* The number of additional terms of the extended model.
* The number of observations minus the number of estimated parameters.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
